revised_title: An Account of Some Books: Experiments, Notes, and Reflections on the Mechanical Origin of Divers Particular Qualities
tldr: The author provides an account of various books and experiments related to the mechanical origin of diverse particular qualities. The works discussed cover topics such as heat, cold, taste, odor, volatility, fixity, corrosiveness, and chemical precipitations. The author argues that qualities of bodies can be explained through mechanical principles, supporting the corpuscular hypothesis.
